attributes.action: Close Epsom General Hospital, the worst district general hospital in Surrey
attributes.additional_details:
Epsom General Hospital is an old, dirty, decaying hospital site first built in the 1890s, it looks like it has not been refurbished since the 1950s.

The staff in the hospital do not care about patient welfare and abuse resident's Human Rights, including their "Right to Life".

The staff seemingly on a routine basis, detain residents against their will and in breach of English and International Law.

The hospital is not even able to get the resident's routine prescribed medication, when it is needed and residents are forced to go to their own GP to get the medication they require, as the hospital pharmacy is dysfunctional.

The staff can not even be bothered to keep the drinking water dispensers in operational working order and the food is best described as "pet food".

It must be time for a hospital closure!
